gamingthelan.server
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  gamingthelan.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
IServer, java.lang.Runnable
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServer

Allows you to create Server's object as a Singleton. It's able to create a connection to a specific port. It's also able to manages every packet and to identify the client to ban,to unban and to send a massage.

Author:
Digitex Group
